plot: Milhouse's parents are lost at sea, which causes him to become a troubled loner. But his new persona makes him the new most popular kid at school, which sparks jealousy in Bart.

When Milhouse's parents get back together, they go on a second honeymoon on a cruise ship. They then get lost at sea and presumed dead. Milhouse is forced to grow up, and becomes cooler than Bart, who tries hard to regain his previous popularity. Meanwhile, Homer is plagued with trying to remember Marge's eye color.—Kevin

Mr. and Mrs. Van Houten are lost at sea and assumed dead. Milhouse goes to live with the Simpson family. While Milhouse deals with his feelings, he becomes a darker, more introspective child. Having lost much of his former personality, Milhouse exudes cool. By consensus, Milhouse has become the coolest kid in school; this displeases Bart, who formerly was the coolest. Meanwhile, Homer has forgotten Marge's eye color. Marge covers her eyes and/or wears sunglasses to punish Homer for his insensitivity. Milhouse leaves Springfield with an uncle, who is similarly cool.—Ken Miller <wkmiller704@yahoo.com>
